NPC.name: warrior
NPC.description: This reptile is clearly garbed for war with her crossbow slung crosswise on her back and a mace at her hip. She watches you as well, ever alert. Her colouration beneath the brigantine'd tunic she's wearing is leaning somewhere between dusky dark red and the common ochre of the more common peasant lizards. Figure wise tunic with its loosely space metal scales does little to fully conceal the ampleness of her chest, and not extending much past the waist does very little to conceal the shapelyness of her thighs, especially if you're checking her out from behind where the tail makes it ride up.
